CodeEditorModel.Text:
Private firstrun = True Private uniqueImageID As String Private uniqueFilePath As String
Public Sub ChangeImage (ByVal ImageFilePath As String )
'0) Build default path only at firstrun: If firstrun uniqueImageID = _HMI_CurrentPage + "_" + Me.Name uniqueFilePath = System.IO.Path.Combine(ImagePath, uniqueImageID) End If
'1) Copy provided new picture in default path/image System.IO.File.Copy(ImageFilePath, uniqueFilePath, True)
'2) Load .source only at firstrun If firstrun Me.Image0.Source = uniqueFilePath firstrun = False End If
'3) Warn HMI of change for update Omron.Hmi.PageManagement.PageManager.NotifyUpdatedResourceFile(Me.Image0.Source)
End Sub
